answers.answer: Good luck to you.  I failed the first glucose test so I did the 3 hour one today . Just waiting for the results. Its nerve racking
I know and I didn't wanna be a diabetic, I don't like it
I did the 3 hour Again & im very nervous for the results. I cried tears of joy when the first blood work came back normal. But we'll see yet again
I am 34 weeks pregnant with twins and have had diabetes for 32 years. If you need any pointers please ask. I am lucky having had it so long im well under control so happy to help others.
Thanks ladies, and good luck to u

Thanks jo, I'm definitely Askin u if I need anything, this is new for me, I'm gonna be admitted on Wednesday to start with the insulin and to show me how to do it, it ***** because I have to use a needle and I hate it

question: So is official, I'm diabetic, I'm gonna start insulin on Wednesday :(
title: diabetes
